en.contact_thank_you_description: Your message has been received, I'll get back to you as soon as possible!
en.contact_thank_you_reply: The reply will be sent to your email address *{email}*.

fr.contact_thank_you_reply: Ma réponse sera envoyée à votre adresse e-mail *{email}*.

en.title: Or...
